## Request for Proposal: Air Handling Units

*Reference Number*: [WS3918961023-Doc4207494187]
*Publication Date*: September 12, 2023
*Closing Date*: November 3, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

### Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is inviting proposals for the supply of Air Handling Units.

### Key Information
* The procurement method is Competitive - Open bidding.
* The selection criteria is based on Lowest Price.
* The expected contract start and end dates are July 3, 2023, and October 31, 2023, respectively.
* The estimated region of delivery is Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region).
* The agreement is governed by the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and several Canadian free trade agreements.

### Contact Information
* Name: Crystal Denton (PSPC)
* Email: [crystal.denton@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:crystal.denton@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Information on the Request for Proposal and other documents can be found at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17425385](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17425385). Please note that an account is required to access the information.

### Important Notice
The tender closing date is November 3, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST. It is the responsibility of the bidders to ensure they submit their proposals on time and meet the necessary requirements.

Note that the above text has been edited to remove unnecessary information and focus on the key elements of the request for proposal.
